body:
Hi! You probably have seen me in game recently even though I first joined 1 year ago. I'm writing this post mainly for several reasons: I'm really looking forward to talking with you and having a good time. And most importantly, I don't want to be treated like a noob if I don't know where the monument is :3

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask them to me! I'll give you a cookie :D

title: Introducing myself (best title ever)

Welcome back I guess?! :P
